Senior Technical Recruiter at Morgan McKinley | Recruiting Rockstar | Transforming Careers and Companies
Job poster
Message
About the job
Morgan McKinley is hiring for a Software Engineer contract assignment with a possibility to extend or to go perm!

Responsibilities:
Develop, test, and deploy comprehensive end-to-end (chat and web) experiences to enhance product understanding, leveraging our product knowledge repository and catalog.
Design and expand the architecture of our product knowledge repository to support scalability and efficiency.
Design and expand the architecture of our product catalog to accommodate growth and complexity.
Create intelligent agents capable of utilizing resources and tools to deliver expert-level insights into Grab’s product catalog, including rollout status and performance metrics.
Requirements:
More than 3 years relevant experience
Hands-on experience with AI development tools and building intelligent agents.
Proficient in coding with Python, Go, and React.
Familiarity with machine learning ecosystems, including platforms, libraries, and frameworks, is a plus.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
About the company
Morgan McKinley
941,963 followers
Follow
Staffing and Recruiting 1,001-5,000 employees 1,388 on LinkedIn
Morgan McKinley is a global talent services expert, offering the full spectrum of solutions to meet both employers’ and jobseekers’ needs.
With 19 offices in 10 countries and nearly 1000 employees, it provides 3 distinct solutions for customers.

- Recruitment Solutions encompassing deep expertise across 10 professional disciplines offering temporary, contract and permanent recruitment;
- Executive Search for targeted C-Suite talent searches;
- Talent Solutions empowering talent acquisition to deliver excellence at every step through expert RPO, MSP and Total Talent Solutions.

Morgan McKinley is part of Org Group, leaders in Organisational Engineering. Empowering businesses to evolve and thrive through talent, technology and exceptional customer experiences.

www.morganmckinley.com/uk
